segment.source: This reference of security settings provides information about how to implement and manage security policies, including setting options and security considerations.
segment.target: This reference of security settings provides information about how to implement and manage security policies, including setting options and security considerations.

segment.source: This reference of security settings provides information about how to implement and manage security policies, including setting options and security considerations.
segment.target: This reference of security settings provides information about how to implement and manage security policies, including setting options and security considerations.

segment.source: This reference focuses on those settings that are considered security settings.
segment.target: This reference focuses on those settings that are considered security settings.

segment.source: This reference examines only the settings and features in the Windows operating systems that can help organizations secure their enterprises against malicious software threats.
segment.target: This reference examines only the settings and features in the Windows operating systems that can help organizations secure their enterprises against malicious software threats.

segment.source: Management features and those security features that you cannot configure are not described in this reference.
segment.target: Management features and those security features that you cannot configure are not described in this reference.

segment.source: Each policy setting described contains referential content such as a detailed explanation of the settings, best practices, default settings, differences between operating system versions, policy management considerations, and security considerations that include a discussion of vulnerability, countermeasures, and potential impact of those countermeasures.
segment.target: Each policy setting described contains referential content such as a detailed explanation of the settings, best practices, default settings, differences between operating system versions, policy management considerations, and security considerations that include a discussion of vulnerability, countermeasures, and potential impact of those countermeasures.

segment.source: An overview of account policies in Windows and provides links to policy descriptions.
segment.target: An overview of account policies in Windows and provides links to policy descriptions.

segment.source: Provides information about basic audit policies that are available in Windows and links to information about each setting.
segment.target: Provides information about basic audit policies that are available in Windows and links to information about each setting.

segment.source: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.
segment.target: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.

segment.source: Provides information about the advanced security audit policy settings that are available in Windows and the audit events that they generate.
segment.target: Provides information about the advanced security audit policy settings that are available in Windows and the audit events that they generate.

segment.source: Provides an overview and links to information about the User Rights Assignment security policy settings user rights that are available in Windows.
segment.target: Provides an overview and links to information about the User Rights Assignment security policy settings user rights that are available in Windows.
